- https://qiita.com/7110/items/4ece0ce9be0ce910ee90

- https://docs.python.org/ja/3/library/datetime.html#datetime.datetime.microsecond

```

echo | opy 'B:{import datetime;};{n=datetime.datetime.now();};E:{print(n)}';date "+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%6N"
2020-07-11 17:43:32.549949
2020-07-11 17:43:32.552770


echo | opy 'B:{import datetime;};{n=datetime.datetime.now();};E:{print(n.year,n.month,n.day,n.hour,n.minute,n.second,n.microsecond,sep="\n")}';
2020
7
11
17
45
35
231628

echo | opy 'B:{import datetime;};{n=datetime.datetime.now();};E:{print(n.weekday(),sep="\n")}';
5

echo | opy 'B:{import datetime;import math;n=datetime.datetime.now();};{[print(n+datetime.timedelta(days=math.ceil(i/7),minutes=i*10)) for i in range(0,31+1)]};E:{}';
```
